name: Steel Destiny: Arena
description:
This is an endless deckbuilding game that mixes card based gameplay, with real time elements, to create a unique and fun gameplay loop. There are 5 different units, each with different play styles,  and reasons to play them, depending on your enemies, the cards and upgrades you choose during your run, or simply just cause you like em. No sound effects yet(except music), sorry ;/, but your inputs are working don't worry. Made originally for a Game Jam.  

Credit for Cover Art: https://opengameart.org/users/xevin
